verses.plain: Keep not thou silence, O God: hold not thy peace, and be not still, O God.

tokens.t: Keep not thou silence, O God: hold not thy peace, and be not still, O God.

verses.plain: For, lo, thine enemies make a tumult: and they that hate thee have lifted up the head.

tokens.t: For, lo, thine enemies make a tumult: and they that hate thee have lifted up the head.

verses.plain: They have taken crafty counsel against thy people, and consulted against thy hidden ones.

tokens.t: They have taken crafty counsel against thy people, and consulted against thy hidden ones.

verses.plain: They have said, Come, and let us cut them off from being a nation; that the name of Israel may be no more in remembrance.

tokens.t: They have said, Come, and let us cut them off from
a nation; that the name of Israel may be no more in remembrance.

verses.plain: For they have consulted together with one consent: they are confederate against thee:

tokens.t: For they have consulted together with one consent: they are confederate against thee:

verses.plain: The tabernacles of Edom, and the Ishmaelites; of Moab, and the Hagarenes;

tokens.t: The tabernacles of Edom, and the Ishmaelites; of Moab, and the Hagarenes;

verses.plain: Gebal, and Ammon, and Amalek; the Philistines with the inhabitants of Tyre;

tokens.t: Gebal, and Ammon, and Amalek; the Philistines with the inhabitants of Tyre;

verses.plain: Assur also is joined with them: they have holpen the children of Lot. Selah.

tokens.t: Assur also is joined with them: they have holpen the children of Lot. Selah.

verses.plain: Do unto them as unto the Midianites; as to Sisera, as to Jabin, at the brook of Kison:

tokens.t: Do unto them as
the Midianites; as
Sisera, as
Jabin, at the brook of Kison:

verses.plain: Which perished at Endor: they became as dung for the earth.

tokens.t: perished at Endor: they became
dung for the earth.

verses.plain: Make their nobles like Oreb, and like Zeeb: yea, all their princes as Zebah, and as Zalmunna:

tokens.t: Make their nobles like Oreb, and like Zeeb: yea, all their princes as Zebah, and as Zalmunna:

verses.plain: Who said, Let us take to ourselves the houses of God in possession.

tokens.t: Who said, Let us take to ourselves the houses of God in possession.

verses.plain: O my God, make them like a wheel; as the stubble before the wind.

tokens.t: O my God, make them like a wheel; as the stubble before the wind.

verses.plain: As the fire burneth a wood, and as the flame setteth the mountains on fire;

tokens.t: As the fire burneth a wood, and as the flame setteth the mountains on fire;

verses.plain: So persecute them with thy tempest, and make them afraid with thy storm.

tokens.t: So persecute them with thy tempest, and make them afraid with thy storm.

verses.plain: Fill their faces with shame; that they may seek thy name, O LORD.

tokens.t: Fill their faces with shame; that they may seek thy name, O

verses.plain: Let them be confounded and troubled for ever; yea, let them be put to shame, and perish:

tokens.t: Let them be confounded and troubled for ever; yea, let them be put to shame, and perish:

verses.plain: That men may know that thou, whose name alone is JEHOVAH, art the most high over all the earth.

tokens.t: That
may know that thou, whose name alone
the most high over all the earth.

footnotes.text: holpen: Heb. been an arm to
